definition: Apia, capital of the Independent State of Samoa
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]

sentences.english: In Apia, though, opponents are determined to fight the change.
sentences.chinese: 然而在阿皮亞，反對者已經下定決心要抗爭下去。

sentences.english: Juve target French duo as Arsenal eye Appiah.
sentences.chinese: 尤文盯上法國二人組而阿森納則看上了阿皮亞。
